channel.title: Why!
channel.description: i have a 508 server and random people loggin and they say somethin like "good fight" and all of a sudden like 5000 accounts with a name like 23987239 and stuff start logging in, and it starts lagging my server, i ip ban them but why do people keep doing this and whats the worst that can happen, can they mess up my whole server?

item.title: Why!
item.dc:creator: @jrs0804 jrs0804
item.description:
@jrs0804 wrote:

i made it so it auto bans them, but wtf y do ppl do this where does it get them?!?!? do they have nothing better to do its happened to me about 5 times today

Read full topic

nothing to do with the server or client its the players there crashers thats the biggest poblem with servers anymore
